Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.1 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.9 with a standard deviation 2.9. The z-score of the person with 12.1 right is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.01
* 0.41
* 1.79

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.01: Incorrect
* 0.41: Correct
* 1.79: Incorrect
